## Contact Policy

- **Course questions:** Please post questions about course content on the Piazza discussion forum so that all students can benefit from the answers.
- **Personal matters:** Email the instructor directly.
- **Problem set questions:** Post on the discussion forum or come to office hours.
- **Expected response time:** We aim to respond to discussion posts within 24 hours on weekdays.
